text: I had a distinct impression that the hut had recently been cleaned and prepared for visitors. Mrs Caine said we were to go no further unless and until we were sent for, confirming another impression that became more and more definite, namely, that she was in touch with an invisible source of authority.
handwritten_text: I had a distinct impression that the hut had recently been cleaned and prepared for visitors. Mrs Caine said we were to go no further unless and until we were sent for, confirming another impression that became more and more definite, namely, that she was in touch with an invisible source of authority.
